title: Into the Clear Water
description: I used his body to forget the pain until the line we drew was buried under muddied water.I used to believe in three That true love only existed once, heartbreak couldnâ€™t kill you, and everything happened for a reason.But if that were true, I never would have watched Daniel McCray get married to another woman, have a beautiful baby girl, and pass away before my very eyes.Everything I believed was a lie.Until I met them.
author: B. Celeste
